com.mapzen.tangram

Class HttpHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.tangram.HttpHandler

  • public class HttpHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    HttpHandler is a class for customizing HTTP requests for map resources, it can be extended to override the request or caching behavior.

      • onRequest

        public boolean onRequest(java.lang.String url,
                Callback cb)
        Begin an HTTP request
        Parameters:
        url - URL for the requested resource
        cb - Callback for handling request result

      • onCancel

        public void onCancel(java.lang.String url)
        Cancel an HTTP request
        Parameters:

      • setCache

        public boolean setCache(java.io.File directory,
               long maxSize)
        Cache map data in a directory with a specified size limit
        Parameters:
        directory - Directory in which map data will be cached
        maxSize - Maximum size of data to cache, in bytes
        Returns:
        true if cache was successfully created
